sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A triangle ABC with AB = AC is an equilateral triangle. If the length of one side is 6 cm, what is the length of each of the other sides?
message_2: In an equilateral triangle, all three sides are equal in length. Since one side is given as 6 cm, the other two sides, AB and AC, will also be 6 cm each.
